programme.title: New Amsterdam S2
programme.desc: Max searches for a solution to crowdfunding after his eye-opening appearance in a viral Go Fund Me video. Reynolds takes his last laps at the hospital while Kapoor helps a former pilot deal with his life as a paraplegic.

programme.title: Supermarket Sweep US S1
programme.desc: The classic TV game show Supermarket Sweep, hosted and executive produced by Emmy Award-nominated comedienne and actress Leslie Jones is a fast-paced and energetic series following three teams of two as they battle it out using their grocery shopping skills and knowledge of merchandise to win big cash prizes.

programme.title: World's Funniest Videos S3
programme.desc: Showcasing funny (or odd) videos, often featuring kids, adults or pets doing weird things.

programme.title: World's Wildest Weather S2
programme.desc: From freak tornadoes appearing out of nowhere, to pounding storms with hailstones the size of footballs... this fast-paced, adrenaline-filled, and shocking documentary series charts some of the most extreme weather from around the globe. Mixing first-person witness statements, expert commentary, user-generated content, CGI and science, it's a memorable examination of some of the wildest weather systems ever seen.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40
programme.desc: All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: The Wall UK S4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo S2
programme.desc: The uniqueness of Mat Yoyo is the experiential learning through everyday things found around The 2 adorable cats, Yoyo and Yaya will ask many questions which trigger a learning journey or discovery. They will be joined by Kim Wakerman & Joakim Gomez as their big 'sister' & 'brother'.

programme.title: Hoppy & Friends
programme.desc: Hoppy and Friends is a Pre-school series featuring Hoppy, the Rabbit, Leo the Lion and Panny the Panda. Every episode, they embark on an adventure through stories. Join them on a fantastic journey and explore the wonderful world around them through song, dance.

programme.title: Kit n Kate S1
programme.desc: Two small kitties named Kit and Kate love their toy box. As soon as they hop inside, magic starts to happen. Kid's imagination transforms their room into a blueberry island, race track or a medieval castle. Every time the kitties create a whole new world with amazing discoveries, surprises and not-so-easy-to-solve dilemmas.

programme.title: The Fixies S3
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.title: Dino Pororo S1
programme.desc: Pororo and Crong go on adventures in the dinosaur world!

programme.title: The Enchanted Village Of Pinocchio
programme.desc: THE ENCHANTED VILLAGE OF PINOCCHIO is a fun and positive adaptation of Carlo Collodi's masterpiece. It's a series for the entire family, both moving and funny, where the world of childhood meets the world of fairy tales.

programme.title: Marblegen
programme.desc: In a world where marble play has become one of the most popular sports, Marblegens tournaments, magical marbles with extraordinary powers, are all the rage. Forming the Meteor team, Assa, Cosmo, Luna and Sam decided to participate in the Olympia MARBLEGAMES, one of the biggest tournaments on the planet! Their objective: to prevent the terrible Marcellus King from seizing the powerful Mercury ball, a reward offered to the winners.

programme.title: The Smurfs S2
programme.desc: Blue and small, standing only three apples high, the Smurfs might be hard to tell apart at first. However, each Smurf is a distinct individual with his or her own personality, their names say it all!

programme.title: What On Earth S2
programme.desc: Zachary and Leonardo continue to disagree with the idea of free-dress day. Meanwhile Raffles discover a letter from Amaal. It appears she is applying for a part-time job to save money for Space Camp. Leonardo realises Zachary is right - free dress could very uncomfortable for those who can't afford to keep up. He announces a reversal of policy.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Thrilled at the arrival of her first pimples, Celeste joins the Springwood's Acne Anonymous Forum. Tensions run high when an anonymous participant, Tako, criticises Celeste for her toxic positivity.

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: On Calypso Island, three crews are taught Pfffiracy by the legendary Captain Lamar. This tough training program ranges from sailing exercises and treasure hunting competitions to cannon firing and accosting enemy ships! But it would take more than that for Pat, Lily or Stede to give up. When a Pfffirate has friends to count on, nothing is impossible!

programme.title: 失去自我
programme.desc: 在小学被老师责骂，黄钦卫从9岁开始在学校就没有说过一句话。无法出声的他后来被诊断出患有选择性缄默症，一种在某种情况无法说话的焦虑症。禁锢在恐惧的无声世界里，黄钦卫不只交不到朋友，还成为了同学们霸凌的对象。而陈再发因为中风导致失语症，在一夕之间失去了说话、表达的能力。有口难言的他们如何重拾自己的声音.

programme.title: 星期二特写 ： 厂区探游
programme.desc: 工业区给予人们的印象是一个汇集了不同工业项目的集中地。深入探索，它也是个多面向的区域，提供了工作、学习、生活、消费、满足各方面的需求。此外，人与人之间也在这儿碰撞出不同的火花。五集《厂区探游》通过裕廊、勿洛、兀兰、亨德申和新民路工业区，彰显五个工业厂区的真实面貌，独有的厂区文化和丰富的人文故事.

programme.title: 食在有价值 4
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 随着生活品质提高，人们不仅要吃得健康，对所饮用的食品也必须有益于地球而且还是可持续的。不过，这样对食物的要求真的会起任何作用吗？关键是否在于我们种植、运输或消费的方式之间？这集探讨人们如何利用更少的资源耕种更多的食物，也深入了解新加坡科学家和初创企业所研发的一些替代蛋白质和优化食品，如鲈鱼和水稻。.

programme.title: 秘密与谎言
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 华沁跟在彬拿着吴会长的遗嘱表示吴会长认定他们有继承美成集团股份的资格。华沁跟在彬两人重新搬回美成家并且命令权室长赶走妍熙。.

programme.title: 秘密与谎言
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)又庭为了要拿回在彬手上的针孔摄影笔，她假借要跟华沁借衣服而闯入了他们的房间。.

programme.title: 我的灿烂人生
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 理事们决定让福熙和尚雅各自负责梦想牌童装跟名牌奥黛莉，以销售成绩来决定谁能当上代表理事。.

programme.title: 我的灿烂人生
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 有人在网上散播对梦想牌童装不利的消息。时景替福熙起诉写负评的人，赫然发现那人竟是贤熙。.

programme.title: 乘风破浪（第三季）
programme.desc: (PG) 本季节目节目集结了30位优秀的歌手、演员、舞蹈艺术家等，在专业制作团的全程协助下，一同突破自我，为观众呈现精彩的舞台。此外前两季的冠军宁静与那英也以师姐身份回归《乘风破浪第三季》。.

programme.title: 天生一对 2
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/泰) 阿琳见葵婆偏袒溥丹，扬言和葵婆断绝关系。佳拉洁和仆人讨论溥丹可能是真正的佳拉洁，两个仆人认为若是如此，他们一定可以在两桂寻得蛛丝马迹。.

programme.title: 天生一对 2
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/泰) 溥丹到了两桂遇见玫瑰和参观寺庙时总是想起真正佳拉洁的记忆画面。理恩告诉朗恩不希望溥丹触碰奎师那加利经书然后离开他。.

programme.title: 逆天奇案
programme.desc: (PG13-暴力画面)(重) 许浚森（陈展鹏饰）是O记精英干探，勇武能干，深受上司器重及战友欣赏，但他最终梦想却是加入飞虎队。另一名O记精英干探沈韦力（黄智贤饰），有着精明头脑及丰富经验。二人处事方式虽截然不同，但惺惺相惜，彼此互补不足。不料警队适匪徒埋伏，伤亡惨重，为了找出幕后黑手，森放弃梦想留在O记。 除此之外，森、力二人亦要面对一系列曲折诡秘，刁钻莫测的逆天奇案。二人利用逆向思考、心理博奕、缜密分析，解构罪犯思维动机。 天网恢恢，绝不遗漏.

programme.title: 离地自由行 S4
programme.desc: 第四次出游，「离地」主持袁学谦踏足法国南部，展开一场寻味之旅。卡尔卡松以「卡书雷特」料理闻名，学谦用味蕾感受当地一丝不苟的烹调精神；也会到图卢兹，见识这个科技主导的古旧城市。他及后抵达莎拉小镇，窥探松露、合桃等特产的滋味秘密。波尔多的酒庄享誉国际，业界活动「Vertical Tasting」有多神秘？主持有幸浅酌拥有140年历史的极品红酒，一试难忘！另外，学谦闯进巴黎蓝带厨艺学院学做甜品.

programme.title: 百味人生
programme.desc: (重) 农民耕种渴望庄稼丰收。渔民出海渴望鱼虾丰收。每年一到丰收的季节，也是享用美食的最佳时期。在丰收的季节里，人们相聚庆贺，共享美食佳肴，抒发与分享喜悦之情。人们感谢大自然的馈赠，期望来年也能收获满满。.

programme.title: 分界线
programme.desc: (重) 世界海拔最高的通航湖泊的的喀喀湖中，古老的乌鲁斯族人在自建的浮岛上生活繁衍了数百年。虽然几代人都过着与世隔绝的渔民生活，近几十年来岛民为了脱离贫困却不得不开放门户接待大量涌入的游客。大部分的乌鲁斯人也已经离开了浮岛，融入秘鲁的现代生活当中。与时并进或是保留传统，这些“湖泊的子民”该如何选择？.
